newsitem.title: USA: PerSeptive sees gain from merger in Q2.
newsitem.headline: PerSeptive sees gain from merger in Q2.

text.p: PerSeptive Biosystems Inc said that it plans to record a special gain of $1.30 to $1.50 a share during the second fiscal quarter of 1997, as a result of the recently announced merger of Millennium Pharmaceuticals Inc with ChemGenics Pharmaceuticals Inc.
PerSeptive said it will record the special gain upon its receipt of 1.6 million shares of Millennium stock and other consideration in exchange for its investment in ChemGenics.
PerSeptive will receive Millennium stock currently valued at about $30 million and $4 million in cash upon the closing of the transaction, which is scheduled for February 1997.
